definition: The term "Arbeitsweise" refers to the manner or method in which work is carried out. It typically describes the specific approach, style, or technique employed during the process of performing tasks or completing projects. This term is commonly used in various professional and academic contexts, particularly in discussions related to work processes, organizational efficiency, and productivity improvement.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsweise des Teams ist sehr effizient.
examples.english: The team's working method is very efficient.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsweise der Maschine muss verbessert werden.
examples.english: The working method of the machine needs to be improved.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsweise des Unternehmens ist kundenorientiert.
examples.english: The company's working method is customer-oriented.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsweise der Software ist benutzerfreundlich.
examples.english: The working method of the software is user-friendly.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsweise des Projekts wird regelmäßig überprüft.
examples.english: The working method of the project is regularly reviewed.
